title: Infosys to bag a $100 million pie in $1 billion Microsoft-Coca Cola deal
description: In a regulatory filing this month, Coca-Cola Euro Pacific Partners PLC, a subsidiary of The Coca-Cola Company, said, “During the first half of 2024, the group made a commitment to TCCC (The Coca-Cola Company) to invest €167 million with Microsoft for Azure cloud migration services over a 6-year term. A further €25 million has been committed to Infosys who will act as a supporting partner.”
content: Infosys could rake in a revenue of more than $100 million as supporting partner in the $1.1-billion cloud migration deal beverages giant Coca Cola signed with Microsoft in April this year, people aware of the matter said.
cleaned_content: infosys could rake in a revenue of more than <ONE_HUNDRED> million as supporting partner in the <ONE_> billion cloud migration deal beverages giant coca cola signed with microsoft in april this year people aware of the matter said
